00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"

00046 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 /* Internal VREF output level setting                                                                       */
00048 #if defined(USE_HT32F50020_30)
00049 
00050   #define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (1220)            // Fix the bandgap voltage
00051 
00052 #elif (LIBCFG_ADC_IVREF_LEVEL_TYPE2)
00053 
00054   #define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_2V5
00055   #define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (2500)
00056 
00057   //#define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_3V0
00058   //#define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (3000)
00059 
00060   //#define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_4V0
00061   //#define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (4000)
00062 
00063   //#define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_4V5
00064   //#define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (4500)
00065 
00066 #elif (LIBCFG_ADC_IVREF)
00067 
00068   #if (LIBCFG_ADC_IVREF_DEFAULT_08V)
00069   #define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_0V8
00070   #define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (800)
00071   #else
00072   #define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_1V215
00073   #define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (1215)
00074   #endif
00075 
00076   //#define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_2V0
00077   //#define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (2000)
00078 
00079   //#define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_2V5
00080   //#define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (2500)
00081 
00082   //#define ADC_VREF_LEVEL                ADC_VREF_2V7
00083   //#define VREF_VALUE_mV                 (2700)
00084 
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00088 void ADC_Configuration(void);
00089 
00090 void ADC_MainRoutine(void);
00091 
00092 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00093 u32 gADC_Result[3];
00094 volatile bool gADC_CycleEndOfConversion;
00095 
00096 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00098   * @brief  Main program.
00099   * @retval None
00100   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00101 int main(void)
00102 {
00103   RETARGET_Configuration();
00104 
00105   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00106   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00107   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED3);
00108 
00109   ADC_Configuration();
00110 
00111   ADC_Cmd(HT_ADC0, ENABLE);
00112 
00113   HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED1);
00114 
00115   /* Software trigger ADC start                                                                             */
00116   ADC_SoftwareStartConvCmd(HT_ADC0, ENABLE);
00117 
00118   while (1)
00119   {
00120     ADC_MainRoutine();
00121   }
00122 }
00123 
00124 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00125   * @brief  ADC main routine.
00126   * @retval None
00127   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00128 void ADC_MainRoutine(void)
00129 {
00130   if (gADC_CycleEndOfConversion)
00131   {
00132     gADC_CycleEndOfConversion = FALSE;
00133 
00134     /* Show internal VREF voltage and ADC result                                                            */
00135     printf("VREF=   %4dmV  Value= %4d\n\r", VREF_VALUE_mV, gADC_Result[1]);
00136 
00137     /* Show VDDA, MVDDA, and ADC input (potentiometer) voltage and ADC result                               */
00138     printf("VDDA=   %4dmV  \n\r", (VREF_VALUE_mV * 4095) / gADC_Result[1]);
00139     printf("MVDDA=  %4dmV  Value= %4d\n\r", (VREF_VALUE_mV * gADC_Result[0]) / gADC_Result[1], gADC_Result[0]);
00140     printf("VR=     %4dmV  Value= %4d\n\n\r", (VREF_VALUE_mV * gADC_Result[2]) / gADC_Result[1], gADC_Result[2]);
00141   }
00142 }
00143 
00144 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00145   * @brief  ADC configuration.
00146   * @retval None
00147   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00148 void ADC_Configuration(void)
00149 {
00150   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00151     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00152     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00153     CKCUClock.Bit.ADC0 = 1;
00154     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00155   }
00156 
00157   /* Configure AFIO mode as ADC and VREF function                                                           */
00158   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_VR_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_VR_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_ADC0);
00159 
00160   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00161      The VREF output to IO is for test purposes only, it is not recommended to use the VREF output with an
00162      external circuit.
00163   */
00164   #if 0
00165   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_VREF_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_VREF_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SYSTEM);
00166   #endif
00167 
00168   { /* ADC related settings                                                                                 */
00169     /* CK_ADC frequency is set to (CK_AHB / 64)                                                             */
00170     CKCU_SetADCnPrescaler(CKCU_ADCPRE_ADC0, CKCU_ADCPRE_DIV64);
00171 
00172     /* One Shot mode, sequence length = 3                                                                   */
00173     ADC_RegularGroupConfig(HT_ADC0, ONE_SHOT_MODE, 3, 0);
00174 
00175     /* ADC conversion time = (Sampling time + Latency) / CK_ADC = (1.5 + ADST + 12.5) / CK_ADC              */
00176     /* Set ADST = 36, sampling time = 1.5 + ADST                                                            */
00177     #if (LIBCFG_ADC_SAMPLE_TIME_BY_CH)
00178       // The sampling time is set by the last parameter of the function "ADC_RegularChannelConfig()".
00179     #else
00180     ADC_SamplingTimeConfig(HT_ADC0, 0);
00181     #endif
00182 
00183     /* Set ADC conversion sequence as channel n                                                             */
00184     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_CH_MVDDA, 0, 0);
00185     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, HTCFG_INTERNAL_CH, 1, 0);
00186     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HT_ADC0, HTCFG_VR_ADC_CH, 2, 0);
00187 
00188     /* Set software as ADC trigger source                                                                   */
00189     ADC_RegularTrigConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_TRIG_SOFTWARE);
00190   }
00191 
00192   #if defined(USE_HT32F50020_30)
00193   #else
00194   /* Select the internal VREF output level and enable it                                                    */
00195   ADC_VREFConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_VREF_LEVEL);
00196   #endif
00197 
00198   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00199      VREF needs a minimum of 100 ms stable time (tSTABLE) after enable, please check the datasheet for the
00200      actual timing. You shall take care of a delay for the stable time according to the application.
00201   */
00202   ADC_VREFCmd(HT_ADC0, ENABLE);
00203 
00204   /* Enable MVDDA function                                                                                  */
00205   ADC_MVDDACmd(HT_ADC0, ENABLE);
00206 
00207   /* Enable ADC single/cycle end of conversion interrupt                                                    */
00208   ADC_IntConfig(HT_ADC0, ADC_INT_SINGLE_EOC | ADC_INT_CYCLE_EOC, ENABLE);
00209 
00210   /* Enable the ADC interrupts                                                                              */
00211   NVIC_EnableIRQ(ADC0_IRQn);
00212 }
00213 
00214 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00215 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00216   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00217   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00218   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00219   * @retval None
00220   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00221 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00222 {
00223   /*
00224      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00225      Debug message can be added here.
00226      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00227   */
00228 
00229   while (1)
00230   {
00231   }
00232 }
00233 #endif
